pullRequest.title: Added documentation for p2, osgi and local repo
pullRequest.bodyText:
Also removed an unused config property from the P2Config
removed some odd characters in the wrapping md

With the LocalIndexRepo I would need some help. I can't make heads or tails out of some of the properties,
Signed-off-by: Juergen Albert j.albert@data-in-motion.biz

nodes.bodyText: Removing this hardly seems worth a major package bump. Perhaps just mark it deprecated instead. And you don't need to document it in the docs page.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -32,10 +32,4 @@
 	 */
 	String location(String string);
 
-	/**
-	 * If not set or false, this assumes a P2 repository, i.e. the url points to
-	 * a P2 repository directory. If set to true, the url is assumed to point to
-	 * an Eclipse Target platform.
-	 */
-	boolean targetPlatform();

nodes.bodyText: I would call the filelocalindexrepo.md That is spell out local.
There is a [ in front of the second OSGi in the sentence
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+---
+title: OSGi Repository
+layout: default
+summary: A plugin to use OSGi repositories 
+---
+
+The OSGi Repository can read index files as specified by the [OSGi Repository Service Specification and is a read only repository.

commit.message:
Added documentation for p2, osgi and local repo

- Also marked the targetPlatform property as deprecated P2Config
- removed some odd characters in the wrapping md

Signed-off-by: Juergen Albert <j.albert@data-in-motion.biz>
